which_bundler_should_i_use: Use Vite as specified in the requirements
which_package_manager: Use pnpm as the package manager
which_styling_solution: Use Tailwind CSS with the @tailwindcss/vite plugin as per shadcn/ui requirements
how_to_add_button_component: Use the command 'pnpm dlx shadcn@latest add button' after setting up the project
what_vite_plugins_needed: You need @vitejs/plugin-react and proper tailwindcss configuration in vite.config.ts
where_to_configure_tailwind: Configure Tailwind in src/index.css with @tailwind directives and in vite.config.ts
what_typescript_config_files: You need both tsconfig.json and tsconfig.app.json with appropriate compiler options
should_i_initialize_git: Not required for this benchmark, focus on the shadcn project setup
what_react_version: Use the latest stable React version compatible with shadcn/ui
where_should_components_go: shadcn components should be in src/components/ui/ directory
do_i_need_tailwind_config: Yes, you need tailwind.config.js or tailwind.config.ts for proper configuration
